ComicInfo.Summary:
Your Grave Is Ready: A wolf boy is raised by a benign professor to lead a normal life. On a ski trip to the woods, the werewolf heritage overcomes the young man. He kills over and over again until stopped dead by a silver bullet.
The Rat Man: Weird facts about head hunters and card tricks.
The Wailing Woman: The handsome and charming exterminator Sylvan Pims weasels his way into the heart of rich Rose Barstow. After the wedding, Sims lets his rats loose on the poor woman. But the rats won't stop feasting.
Till Death Do Us Part: The streets of Mexico City are haunted by "La Llorona", the wailing woman.
The Bleeding Platter: Peter and John are Siamese twins. Even when separated they experience each other's pain. A girl gets involved and hate flares up, with fatal consequences.
The Phantom Hitch Hiker: A man gives a lift to a young woman who died the week before.
ComicInfo.Title: Your Grave Is Ready; The Rat Man; The Wailing Woman; Till Death Do Us Part; The Bleeding Platter; The Phantom Hitch Hiker
